content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":32791,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええい鬱陶しい……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, so annoying…!\""},{"lineNumber":32792,"originalJapaneseLine":"　蹴り飛ばすぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll kick you away!\""},{"lineNumber":32793,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaaa!\""},{"lineNumber":32794,"originalJapaneseLine":"「総統」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Supreme Commander\""},{"lineNumber":32795,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、ウルザちゃん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, Urza-chan."},{"lineNumber":32796,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こいつら、駆除するぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's exterminate these guys.\""},{"lineNumber":32797,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やだー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nooo!\""},{"lineNumber":32798,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その事なのですが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"About that matter..."},{"lineNumber":32799,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そろそろ、城周辺に集まっているハニーの数は","translatedEnglishLine":"The number of Honeys gathering around the castle"},{"lineNumber":32800,"originalJapaneseLine":"　5000を越えようとしています」","translatedEnglishLine":"is about to exceed 5,000.\""},{"lineNumber":32801,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ご、ごせん、ですか…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"F-five thousand... really...?\""},{"lineNumber":32802,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほとんど軍隊だな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's practically an army...\""},{"lineNumber":32803,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そこで……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So then..."},{"lineNumber":32804,"originalJapaneseLine":"　彼らにも手伝ってもらうのはどうでしょう？","translatedEnglishLine":"How about having them help us too?"},{"lineNumber":32805,"originalJapaneseLine":"　幸い、戦意に関しては嘘ではなさそうですし……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Fortunately, their fighting spirit doesn't seem fake..."},{"lineNumber":32806,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだと！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What did you say!?\""},{"lineNumber":32807,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ、話が分かるねぇ君」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, you understand, huh?\""},{"lineNumber":32808,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さんせーーーい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I agreeーーー!\""},{"lineNumber":32809,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今は非常時ですし……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"These are emergency times..."},{"lineNumber":32810,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もちろん、運用には注意しますが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Of course, we'll be careful in how we use them...\""},{"lineNumber":32811,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........................\""},{"lineNumber":32812,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、よく考えたら","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, come to think of it,"},{"lineNumber":32813,"originalJapaneseLine":"　捨て駒に出来るなら構わんか」","translatedEnglishLine":"If we can use them as cannon fodder, it doesn't matter.\""},{"lineNumber":32814,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では、決まりという事で」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then, it's decided.\""},{"lineNumber":32815,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やったーーーっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yayーーー!\""},{"lineNumber":32816,"originalJapaneseLine":"「世界の……平和？　を、守るぞーっ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"To protect the world's... peace?\""},{"lineNumber":32817,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦争だーーー」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's warーーー!\""},{"lineNumber":32818,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わーーいっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaay!\""},{"lineNumber":32819,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………しかし、なんとなく……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...However, somehow..."},{"lineNumber":32820,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺の城がハニワに乗っ取られたような……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It feels like my castle has been taken over by Honeys...\""},{"lineNumber":32821,"originalJapaneseLine":"「にやり」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Grin\""},{"lineNumber":32822,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………やっぱ、叩き割るか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Maybe I should just smash them after all?\""},{"lineNumber":32823,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃーっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaa!\""},{"lineNumber":32824,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニー軍団が仲間に加わった。","translatedEnglishLine":"The Honey Corps have joined as allies."},{"lineNumber":32825,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス城――――","translatedEnglishLine":"Lezas Castle――――"},{"lineNumber":32826,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リア様。本日の謁見希望者ですが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lady Lia. The petitioners for today's audience are...\""},{"lineNumber":32827,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ずいぶん商人が多いわね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...There are quite a lot of merchants."},{"lineNumber":32828,"originalJapaneseLine":"　最近、だいぶこっちに流入してきてるみたいね」","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems many have been coming this way recently.\""},{"lineNumber":32829,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうですね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right."},{"lineNumber":32830,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔軍騒動も、我が国はそろそろ終息しますから」","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army disturbance is about to settle in our country."},{"lineNumber":32831,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それで特需と安全地帯を求めて、かぁ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So they're seeking a special demand and a safe zone, huh."},{"lineNumber":32832,"originalJapaneseLine":"　来るのは構わないけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't mind them coming,"},{"lineNumber":32833,"originalJapaneseLine":"　掻き回されるのは気に入らないわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"but I don't like being stirred up.\""},{"lineNumber":32834,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ではリア様。こちらとこちらは","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then, Lady Lia. These and these people,"},{"lineNumber":32835,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私が処理しておきます。","translatedEnglishLine":"I will handle them."},{"lineNumber":32836,"originalJapaneseLine":"　避難民の受け入れと帰宅許可ですが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Regarding accepting refugees and granting permission to return home..."},{"lineNumber":32837,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んー。それは優先度、一個上げ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm. That should be a higher priority."},{"lineNumber":32838,"originalJapaneseLine":"　国民はさっさと元の生活に戻すに限るわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"The people should get back to their lives quickly.\""},{"lineNumber":32839,"originalJapaneseLine":"「かしこまりました。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Understood."},{"lineNumber":32840,"originalJapaneseLine":"　バレス将軍に、軍の人手を割けるか打診します。","translatedEnglishLine":"I will ask General Bales if he can spare some military personnel."},{"lineNumber":32841,"originalJapaneseLine":"　では次に…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, next...\""},{"lineNumber":32842,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははは、俺様参上！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahaha, I have arrived!\""},{"lineNumber":32843,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃーっ！　ダーーリーーーン！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaa! Dhaaarliiiin!\""},{"lineNumber":32844,"originalJapaneseLine":"それまでの全てをかなぐり捨てて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Throwing everything aside until then,"},{"lineNumber":32845,"originalJapaneseLine":"リアはランスに飛びついた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lia jumped onto Rance."},{"lineNumber":32846,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんか忙しい最中だったか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Was I in the middle of something busy?\""},{"lineNumber":32847,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ダーリンが来てくれたから全然へーき。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm totally fine because my darling came."},{"lineNumber":32848,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すりすり……♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"Snuggle snuggle...♪\""},{"lineNumber":32849,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、マリス。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Maris."},{"lineNumber":32850,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ダーリン来てくれたんだから、","translatedEnglishLine":"Darling came for me, so...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろ、城周辺に集まっているハニーの数は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The number of Honeys gathering around the castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼らにも手伝ってもらうのはどうでしょう？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How about having them help us too?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幸い、戦意に関しては嘘ではなさそうですし……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fortunately, their fighting spirit doesn't seem fake...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もちろん、運用には注意しますが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, we'll be careful in how we use them..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 捨て駒に出来るなら構わんか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we can use them as cannon fodder, it doesn't matter."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「世界の……平和？　を、守るぞーっ。
俺の城がハニワに乗っ取られたような……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It feels like my castle has been taken over by Honeys..."
"...Maybe I should just smash them after all?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニー軍団が仲間に加わった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Honey Corps have joined as allies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リア様。本日の謁見希望者ですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lady Lia. The petitioners for today's audience are..."
"...There are quite a lot of merchants.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最近、だいぶこっちに流入してきてるみたいね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems many have been coming this way recently."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍騒動も、我が国はそろそろ終息しますから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army disturbance is about to settle in our country.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それで特需と安全地帯を求めて、かぁ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So they're seeking a special demand and a safe zone, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 来るのは構わないけど、
掻き回されるのは気に入らないわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I don't like being stirred up."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ではリア様。こちらとこちらは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, Lady Lia. These and these people,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が処理しておきます。
避難民の受け入れと帰宅許可ですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Regarding accepting refugees and granting permission to return home...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んー。それは優先度、一個上げ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm. That should be a higher priority.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国民はさっさと元の生活に戻すに限るわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The people should get back to their lives quickly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレス将軍に、軍の人手を割けるか打診します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will ask General Bales if he can spare some military personnel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃーっ！　ダーーリーーーン！」
それまでの全てをかなぐり捨てて、
リアはランスに飛びついた。
「なんか忙しい最中だったか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Was I in the middle of something busy?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ダーリンが来てくれたから全然へーき。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm totally fine because my darling came.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダーリン来てくれたんだから、

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
